name: Dr. Evelyn Reed
title: Senior AI Researcher
bio: Pioneering researcher in neural network architecture with over 15 years of experience in machine learning and computational linguistics. Published in numerous top-tier journals.

name: Dr. Marcus Thorne
title: Professor of Robotics
bio: Expert in autonomous systems and human-robot interaction. Leads the Advanced Robotics Initiative, focusing on creating collaborative robots for complex environments.

name: Dr. Jian Li
title: Quantum Computing Scientist
bio: Specializes in quantum algorithm development and quantum supremacy research. A key contributor to the development of QuantumLeap's flagship quantum processor.
